snippet: Jeff Gordon won the pole for the Sprint Cup’s Cheez-It 355 at Watkins Glen International in New York.
abstract: Jeff Gordon wins pole for Sprint Cup's Cheez-It 355 auto race at Watkins Glen International in New York.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon won the pole for the Sprint Cup’s Cheez-It 355 at Watkins Glen International in New York.

headline.main: Gordon Wins Pole for Road Course Event
